application_details: Applicants voluntarily surrendered all licenses for financial compensation and signed agreements specifying terms. Requesting reissued shrimp licenses contradicts GLRP conditions.
decision_reasoning: Minister's refusal to reissue shrimp licenses was not patently unreasonable.
cause_of_action: Applicants sought judicial review after DFO refused to reissue shrimp licenses.
procedure_followed: Judicial review application analyzed issues of discrimination, contract validity, and HAB authority.
result_of_case: Application dismissed; no order as to costs.
